pullrequest.title: [gz11] Use XML elements instead of attributes to fit SDF spec

content.raw:
So would we still pass the `<plugin>` tag to every plugin, or only `<parameters>`?

* If we only pass `<parameters>`, Delphyne, as a downstream library, wouldn't have a way to get `<delphyne-gui>`.
* If we pass `<plugin>`, every plugin will need to get the `<parameters>` tag programmatically.

The current way, each plugin can just get the tags it is interested in and ignore the rest.
content.html:
So would we still pass the <plugin> tag to every plugin, or only <parameters>?

  • If we only pass <parameters>, Delphyne, as a downstream library, wouldn't have a way to get <delphyne-gui>.
  • If we pass <plugin>, every plugin will need to get the <parameters> tag programmatically.

The current way, each plugin can just get the tags it is interested in and ignore the rest.
